name: Fluorometry, optical backscattering
description: Measurement of emitted fluorescent light and particulate backscattering coefficient.

name: Mercury-based thermometry
description: Measurement of temperature using a mercury based column.

name: Fluid-based thermometry (excluding mercury)
description: Measurement of temperature using a fluid based column (other than mercury).

name: Electrical resistivity
description: Measurement derived from the measurement of electrical resistivity.

name: Electrical conductivity
description: Measurement derived from the measurement of electrical conductivity.

name: Inductivity
description: Measurement derived from the measurement of magnetic inductance.

name: Piezoresistivity
description: Measurement of the change in electrical resistance of a material under mechanical stress.

name: HF echo Doppler spectra analysis method (HR radar)
description: Remote sensing of surface currents employing radars frequencies.

name: GPS fixes sequence comparison
description: Measurement derived from the difference between two successives GPS positions.

name: Clark electrode polarographic method
description: The dissolved oxygen concentration by counting the number of oxygen molecules per second (flux) that diffuse through the membrane from the ocean environment to the working electrode.

name: Oxygen luminescence quenching method
description: The fluorescent indicator is a special complex embedded in a gas permeable sensing foil that is exposed to the surrounding water. The sensing foil is excited by modulated light; the sensor measures the phase of the returned light.

name: Potentiometric method
description: Ion-sensitive field-effect transistor that responds to proton activity and a Ag/AgCl reference electrode.

name: Radiometry
description: Measurement of the number of photon reaching a surface using a photodiode.
